name: Burning Skies
description:
Burning Skies is a very minimalistic retry style top-down shooter. 

The player controls a simple airplane which can shoot enemies and sustain a certain amount of damage before becoming destroyed. The player can be damaged by enemy bullets or by collisions with enemy planes.

This is a prototype game that serves as a proof of concept. It was created using the Simian Framework, which I wrote using Java.

Credits:

  • Dar Golan (Background Music)
  • The Premiere Edition 10 on videvo.com (Bullet Sound Effect)
  • Pranus Production's Gun Sound Pack (Explosion Sound effect)
